divs: sighting detailswe were driving on an on ramp onto interstate 90. in the middle of a clearing me see a floating triangle. at first we thought it was a helicopter then realized it didn't look like that at all. then we both thought at the same time (after talking about the incident after) it looked like a stealth fighter that was moving extremely slow. right as we thought this is rotated slowly and we could see the whole triangle shape it had. as were looking at it it slowly rises up and over some trees that are near and a couple seconds later it was gone. we turned off the music and windshield wipers, rolled down the window and sat completely still on the on ramp for a good 30-45 seconds. during this time we could see all different sides of it. the bottom had lights on all three corners, a little dimmer light in the center, and small rectangular lights that looked like vents around the bottom. it all happened so fast i'm afraid i cannot give much of a better description than that. i turned my head as it reached the top of the trees to see if the truck coming in the opposite directions was seeing it as well, when i turned my head back i saw a zip of light and it was gone. my feelings regarding the sighting might be skewed by the fact that i see ufos a little too often and i have some kind of strange fear that they are actually following or stalking me waiting for the right time to take me or something...i don't know...but this is the second time i have seen a legitimate ufo with a friend who can vouch for the experience..i am starting to get scared...if anyone could email me if you have similar experiences or you know someone who is interested in documenting these types of stories. rest assured that no matter how far fetched this might sound it is dead serious, i would never say something that is not true nor stretch the truth for dramatics...i just desperately want to know what is going on and i don't know who to ask for help.....[cms\tg\pid]
